body: No longer clear composite region's plan on exiting it to allow continuation of plan execution on resuming the region
* fixed a conflict between `hfsm2::forward()` and `std::forward()` when using `std::variant`
Maintenance release
Added reverse reaction order via `hfsm2::Config::BottomUpReactions`

* Added `destroy<>()`
* switched msbuild workflow to the premake solution
internal maintenance update
- removed superfluous `#include`

* fixed `FullControlT<>::updatePlan()`
* renamed `Status` to `TaskStatus`
* reworked serialization
fixed transition payload interface

* renamed `NCC` to `NCC_` for https://github.com/andrew-gresyk/HFSM2/issues/63
* configure `cmake.yml` action to download and install `clang-10`
* changed `clang-6` through `clang-11` builds to use `ubuntu-20.04`
* changed `clang-13` builds to use default version on `ubuntu-latest`
* added `clang-14`
removed `std::aligned_storage<>`

* breaking change: `AncestorT<>` renamed to `StateT<>`

* added `immediate` versions of transition method on the `M::Root` that don't require subsequent `update()` or `react()`
* added `query(TEvent&, ConstControl&)` state method
* plans can now be accessed from the `M::Root`
* tasks can now be `succeed()`ed and `fail()`ed from the `M::Root`
* changed `LoggerInterface` methods to take `const Context&`
* fixed copy / move ctors
* fixed subsequent plan execution after previous plan failure

enabled `-Wshadow` and `-Wold-style-cast`
renamed `RC_<>` to `InstanceT<>`
cleaned up excessive comment delimiters from `machine.hpp`

based on
https://github.com/andrew-gresyk/HFSM2/pull/71
https://github.com/andrew-gresyk/HFSM2/pull/72

* added `Root::isActive()`
* added `Control::stateId()`
* renamed `StateT<>` to `AncestorsT<>`
* fixed test_ancestors.cpp
+ added `activeSubState()` on root and control

- added `select<>()` transition and `Selectable` region
- reworked injections into ancestors
- added `pre`- and `post`- `Update()` / `React()`

* support move construction
* updated doctest
* removed `reverse*()`

* added `reverseUpdate/React<>()` state and root methods
* added matching `pre/postReverseUpdate/React<>()` injection methods
* made FSM instances smaller using empty base class optimization
* simplified state access
* fixed the handling of the successive identical transition requests
Renamed `NCC` to `NCC_` to avoid conflict with `<sys/ioctl.h>`

* fixed StaticArrayT<>::_items initialization (based on #61)
* moved dev sources from /include to /development folder
* fixed a static analysis issue in test_debug.cpp
* ARM GCC 9.3.0 fixes
* fixed an issue in the GCC 6 build

* `constexpr`-friendlier `RandomT<>`
* whitespace tweaks

fixed AppleClang build
build matrix changes:
  - separate gcc and clang on ubuntu
  - add clang on macos
  - added examples
* fixed an issue with `PlanT::clear()`

* more `constexpr`
* smaller memory footprint

+ added hfsm2::Config::ManualActivation via Root::enter() / exit()
+ added replayEnter() and replayTransition() under HFSM2_ENABLE_TRANSITION_HISTORY

* sprinkled `noexcept` everywhere
* added support for pointer and reference contexts
* added version info
* updated .natvis
* improved `TaskListT<>`
* Fixed strict conformance issue in vs2019
